H3.text: when was the last time minnesota vikings was in the super bowl. XI

A4.text: The Vikings played in Super Bowls IV, VIII, IX and XI, but failed to win any of them.

A5.text: The Vikings have lost in their last six NFC Championship Game appearances, stretching back to 1978.

A6.text: The Vikings lost Super Bowl VIII, which was a one-sided game.

A7.text: The Vikings lost Super Bowl IX, making it their third Super Bowl loss.
